function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale home confinement limiting direct patient encounters","Impact":"Reduced access to psychosocial support and monitoring","Mitigation":"Utilize telemedicine for psychosocial services","Technologies":"Telemedicine","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Psychosocial assessment should include Covid-19-related stressors and secondary adversities","Impact":"Failure to address Covid-19-related psychosocial effects and vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Comprehensive psychosocial assessment using telemedicine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital assessment tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Increased risk of suicidal ideation due to widening economic crisis and uncertainties","Impact":"Potential emergence of suicidal ideation without immediate intervention","Mitigation":"Immediate consultation with mental health professional or referral for emergency psychiatric care","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health assessment tools","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"}]}
